means: 收集
聚集，搜集
收紧，收缩
采集
逐渐增加，积聚
聚集
衣褶

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"积聚，聚集，积累"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: accumulate, amass, collect, gather, heap, pile
means: accumulate ：几乎可用于指任何事物量的增加，侧重连续不断地，一点一滴地聚积。
amass ：着重大量地积聚，尤指对如金钱、珠宝等有价值东西的大量积聚。
collect ：普通用词，多用于指物，侧重指有区别地作选择或有安排有计划地把零散物集中起来。
gather ：普通用词，指人或物或抽象事物都可用。侧重于围绕一个中心的集合、聚集。
heap ：主要指把沙、石、煤、草等堆高，不强调整齐。
pile ：着重指比较整齐地把东西堆积在一起。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这组动词均可表示"集中，归拢"之意。
means: gather ： 换用，但多强调按照一定目的或计划进行有选择的收集。
assemble与collect相比更为突出聚集或收集的目的。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"推断"之意。
means: infer ： 指从已提供的论据或从已接受的前提出发而推断出的结论。
deduce ： 指有充分根据的推论，也指逻辑学上的演绎。
conclude ： 指得出符合逻辑的结论。
gather ： 指从听到的情况推测、判定。
judge ： 多指经过仔细鉴定或评价之后作出决断。

sentence.Network_en: I gather his report is highly critical of the trial judge.
sentence.Network_cn: 据我所知，他在报道中毫不留情地批评了初审法官。

sentence.Network_en: I suggest we gather enough firewood to last the night.
sentence.Network_cn: 我建议大家捡足够多的木柴来撑过这一晚。

sentence.Network_en: Heads of government from more than 100 countries gather in Geneva tomorrow.
sentence.Network_cn: 来自100多个国家的政府首脑明日将齐聚日内瓦。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English gaderian, of West Germanic origin; related to Dutch gaderen, also to together

entry.def: If people gather somewhere or if someone gathers people somewhere, they come together in a group.

example.ex: In the evenings, we gathered around the fireplace and talked...
example.tran: 晚上，我们聚在火炉边聊天。

example.ex: The man signalled for me to gather the children together.
example.tran: 那人示意让我将孩子们召集起来。

entry.def: If you gather things, you collect them together so that you can use them.

example.ex: I suggest we gather enough firewood to last the night...
example.tran: 我建议大家捡足够多的木柴来撑过这一晚。

example.ex: She stood up and started gathering her things together.
example.tran: 她起身开始收拾自己的物品。

entry.tran: （尤指经过一段时间的辛苦工作）收集，搜集（情报、证据等）
entry.def: If you gather information or evidence, you collect it, especially over a period of time and after a lot of hard work.

example.ex: ...a private detective using a hidden tape recorder to gather information...
example.tran: 用暗藏的录音机搜集证据的私家侦探

example.ex: This would help the prosecutor gather evidence against him which could be used in court.
example.tran: 这将有利于控方律师搜集对他不利的证据以在法庭上指控他。

entry.tran: 逐渐增加（速度、动力、力量等）
entry.def: If something gathers speed, momentum, or force, it gradually becomes faster or more powerful.

example.ex: Demands for his dismissal have gathered momentum in recent weeks...
example.tran: 最近几周，要求将他解职的呼声越来越高。

example.ex: The raft gathered speed as the current dragged it toward the falls.
example.tran: 水流将木筏拽向瀑布，木筏的速度越来越快。

entry.tran: 集中（精力、思想等）；鼓起（勇气）；振作（精神）
entry.def: When you gather something such as your strength, courage, or thoughts, you make an effort to prepare yourself to do something.

example.ex: You must gather your strength for the journey.
example.tran: 你必须为这次行程打起精神来。

entry.tran: （用于引出已发现的信息，尤其是间接获得的信息）据我所知，据我了解
entry.def: You use gather in expressions such as 'I gather' and 'as far as I can gather' to introduce information that you have found out, especially when you have found it out in an indirect way.

example.ex: I gather his report is highly critical of the trial judge...
example.tran: 据我所知，他在报道中毫不留情地批评了初审法官。

example.ex: 'He speaks English,' she said to Graham. 'I gathered that.'...
example.tran: “他会说英语，”她对格雷厄姆说，“我料到了。”

entry.def: If you gather fabric or cloth, you make a row of very small folds in it by sewing a thread through it and then pulling the thread tight.

example.ex: Gather the skirt at the waist.

means.word_mean: 1. sewing consisting of small folds or puckers made by pulling tight a thread in a line of stitching

sentences.sentence: "I gather you have not done your homework"

means.word_mean: 5. draw fabric together and sew it tightly

sentences.sentence: "get together all those who are interested in the project"
"Our ancestors gathered nuts in the Fall"

Sentence.sentence: Talking about an important gathering on Tuesday.
There was a time when any personal information that was gathered about us was typed on a piece of paper and locked away in a file cabinet.
Andrew's Episcopal Church in San Antonio, People who gather at its front door on the first and third Thursdays of each month aren't looking for God-they're there for something to eat, St.
The always-on Internet devices raise some novel possibilities, like tracking where students gather together.

When these students encounter a new problem of the same type on a test, they're able to transfer the knowledge they've gathered more effectively than those who were the passive recipients of someone else's expertise.
I was hoping to say "journalist," but researchers are already developing software that can gather facts and write a news story.

sentences.en: The teacher gathered all the pupils in the auditorium.
sentences.cn: 老师把全体同学集合在礼堂内。

sentences.en: I gathered that he was the real leader.
sentences.cn: 我推想他是真正的领导人。

means.word_mean: 收集, 收拢(分散的东西)

sentences.en: The teacher went round the class to gather the papers.
sentences.cn: 老师在教室里走了一圈收试卷。

means.word_mean: 采集, 采拾（植物、水果等）; 收割, 收获

sentences.en: He gathered me some good stamps.
sentences.cn: 他为我收集了一些好邮票。

sentences.en: My boyfriend gathered some beautiful flowers for me.
sentences.cn: 我的男朋友为我采来一些美丽的花。

sentences.en: The child's dress is neatly gathered at the neck.
sentences.cn: 那孩子的衣服在领口处打着整齐的皱褶。
